long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your ChatWork experience with the ChatWork Exporter!

Great news for all ChatWork fans! We've created the ChatWork Exporter, a tool that makes using ChatWork even more efficient.

This tool allows you to effortlessly download entire chat room timelines as CSV files. These downloaded files can be used for a variety of purposes, such as:

Analyzing past conversations
Organizing and archiving data
Integrating with other tools
Start streamlining your workflow with the ChatWork Exporter today!

Message from the Developers:

We're passionate ChatWork users ourselves! In our daily work, we often encountered situations where downloading chat history as a CSV file would be incredibly helpful. That's why we built this tool, and we actively use it for data analysis within our team.

We sincerely hope this tool enhances your ChatWork experience and makes it even more productive and enjoyable.
